responses: Our college offers B.Tech in CSE, ECE, EEE, Mechanical, Civil, and IT. We also provide postgraduate courses like M.Tech, MBA, and MCA.

The Computer Science and Engineering department focuses on programming, artificial intelligence, data science, and software development. It has modern computer labs, experienced faculty, and good placement records.
The annual fee for B.Tech in CSE is around ₹85,000. It may change slightly depending on hostel and transport facilities.
The B.Tech in CSE is a 4-year undergraduate course divided into 8 semesters.
Some core subjects include Programming, Data Structures, Algorithms, Database Management Systems, Computer Networks, AI, and Machine Learning.
CSE students are placed in top companies like Infosys, TCS, Wipro, Amazon, and Accenture with good salary packages.
The Electronics and Communication Engineering department teaches communication systems, VLSI, microprocessors, and embedded systems. It has advanced labs and active research projects.
The fee for B.Tech in ECE is approximately ₹80,000 per year.
The ECE course duration is 4 years, with 8 semesters including lab work and projects.
The Electrical and Electronics Engineering department focuses on power systems, control systems, and electrical machines. It has well-equipped electrical labs and experienced staff.
The yearly fee for B.Tech in EEE is around ₹78,000.
The Mechanical Engineering department deals with design, thermal systems, manufacturing, and robotics. Students get hands-on training in workshops and CAD/CAM labs.
The Mechanical Engineering course costs around ₹82,000 per year.
The Civil department offers subjects like structural design, construction management, and geotechnical engineering. It also provides site visits and field training for practical learning.
The Civil Engineering course fee is approximately ₹80,000 per year.
The Information Technology department focuses on software development, cloud computing, and data analytics. It provides good placement support in top IT companies.
The IT course fee is around ₹83,000 per year.
Students must have passed 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics and should qualify in EAMCET or equivalent entrance exam.
Yes, hostel facilities are available for both boys and girls with clean rooms, good food, Wi-Fi, and security.
The hostel fee is around ₹35,000 to ₹45,000 per year depending on room type and facilities.
Yes, our college has a hygienic canteen that provides tasty and affordable food for students and staff.
Our college has tie-ups with many reputed companies. Every year, students get placed in companies like TCS, Infosys, Wipro, HCL, and Tech Mahindra.
All departments have highly qualified and supportive faculty members who guide students in academics, projects, and placements.
The campus includes computer labs, libraries, sports grounds, seminar halls, a cafeteria, and transportation facilities.
Yes, scholarships are provided to meritorious students and those eligible under government welfare schemes.
The MBA course is a 2-year postgraduate programme focusing on Finance, HR, and Marketing with practical exposure and internships.
The MBA fee is around ₹90,000 per year.
The MCA course is a 3-year postgraduate programme focusing on computer applications, software design, and programming.
The MCA course fee is approximately ₹85,000 per year.
Yes, the entire campus is Wi-Fi enabled for students and faculty.
Yes, the college encourages internships and the placement cell helps students connect with reputed companies.
Yes, transport buses are available from major nearby cities and towns for both students and staff.
The library is spacious with thousands of books, journals, and digital resources. It is open from morning till evening for student access.
Yes, we have separate and secure hostels for boys and girls with 24-hour security and wardens.
Yes, our college organizes annual cultural fests, sports meets, and technical events for student engagement.
Admission is based on entrance exam ranks like EAMCET, followed by counselling and document verification.
Yes, M.Tech courses are offered in CSE, ECE, and Mechanical branches.
Yes, our Training and Placement Cell provides guidance, mock interviews, and soft skill sessions for students.
The regular class timings are from 9:00 AM to 4:30 PM, Monday to Saturday.
Yes, there is a first-aid centre with medical staff available on campus for students and staff.
Yes, a limited number of seats are available under the management quota as per college and government guidelines.
Each department has its own labs. CSE has programming labs, ECE has communication and VLSI labs, and Mechanical has workshops.
Companies like Infosys, Wipro, TCS, Accenture, HCL, Amazon, and Tech Mahindra visit our campus for placements.
Students are expected to wear formal dress. On lab days, lab coats are mandatory. Uniforms are required on specified days.
Each branch generally admits around 120 students per year, depending on the intake capacity approved by AICTE.
The total fee for 4 years of B.Tech is around ₹3.2 to ₹3.4 lakhs depending on the branch.
Vel Tech University campus is spread over approximately 66.75 acres with a built-up area of around 1.5 lakh square meters. It has modern classrooms, labs, hostels, and other world-class facilities.
